document_data.name: Baluth's Hole
document_data.mainbody: '''Baluth's Hole''' was an urban path in [[Scornubel]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Geography: Baluth's Hole was one of the paths leading to [[Belgon Bradaskor]]'s home in Scornubel.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1357}}, [[Sharantyr]] forced [[Besmer Altuth]] to take him to Belgon Bradaskor's home, after the latter failed to mug her. He offered her a choice of paths, between [[Rat Stair]] and Baluth's Hole. She chose the latter.
